author: Noah Yoo
title: Spoon Launch “Aura Reader” With Spotify
text:
5 hrs ago Spoon Launch “Aura Reader” With Spotify The web app analyzes your top 10 Spoon songs and presents you with custom cover artwork Spoon Photo by Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagic 
Spoon and Spotify have partnered up for a new “ Aura Reader .” The web application allows users to log in with their Spotify account and input a playlist containing 10 of their favorite Spoon songs for analysis. In turn, the “Aura Reader” creates a uniquely colorized version of the cover artwork for Spoon’s forthcoming album Hot Thoughts , and also gives percentage readings of the “danceability,” “energy,” “liveness,” and “valence” of the given playlist. Check it out here . Hot Thoughts is out March 17 via Matador. Artists In This Story
